name: The Tourists Retrieval
description:
WINDOWS VERSION IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Rescue tourists from a dark cave with a help from your team. Use grappling gun(left click) to move around the cave. When you want to release a member of your team to help tourists right click. Reload level by pressing R. Your goal is to get one of the rescuers to each person in the cave. This game was made in two days for the Bonfire game jam. All the assets(code, art, sound effects, music) were made during the jam.
